首先，用户任务是：根据 website-analysis.md 中的实现方法第1节，初始化 Astro 项目。运行命令：npm create astro@latest n8n-workflows-site，然后 cd n8n-workflows-site 并 npm install。确保项目在当前工作目录 d:/n8nworkflows.xyz 下创建。完成后，使用 attempt_completion 工具总结项目初始化结果，包括创建的文件和目录结构。


## Initializing Astro Project  
- The task involves setting up an Astro project based on the implementation method from section 1 of website-analysis.md.  
- Run the command `npm create astro@latest n8n-workflows-site` to start, then navigate to the directory with `cd n8n-workflows-site` and run `npm install`.

## Investigating Installation Issue  
- Node.js might not be installed correctly or added to the system's PATH.  
- Suggesting the user check their installation to ensure Node.js is properly set up.  
- Recommending a potential restart of VSCode to refresh the environment.  
- Preparing to ask a follow-up question to clarify the issue further.  
- The problem seems related to Node.js not being recognized, possibly due to PATH configuration.
